title: Pearl Diving Era
summary: Before oil, pearling and trade shaped Kuwait’s early economy and maritime culture.

title: Discovery of Oil
summary: Oil transformed Kuwait’s economy and urban development through the mid-20th century.

title: Independence
summary: Kuwait gained independence, marking a new era of statehood and modernization.

title: Liberation
summary: Following the Gulf War, Kuwait was liberated and began reconstruction and renewal.

title: Al Shaheed Park Opening
summary: A major urban park and cultural hub opened, adding green space and museums to the city.
